activity.text: Custom date range filter implemented in Contributor Activity (#294)

activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#388
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
I have used same DateRangePicker.tsx component which was used in Leaderboard page. 
I saw the above responsiveness issue for small screen is there in the Leaderboard page too. 

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/leaderboard/assets/83684042/cfcb4e80-507f-40d7-bfbb-5e64381bfabc)

So, I have now made the DateRangePicker.tsx component responsive for smaller screen. 

Screenshots: 
1. In contributors page, on large screen. 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/leaderboard/assets/83684042/56b6ae85-81e9-446d-8f48-979e474ee55d)

2. In contributors page, on small screen. 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/leaderboard/assets/83684042/1c4a0d8e-a1fc-4f2e-9d04-300ba347a2b5)

3. In leaderboard page, on small screen. 
 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/leaderboard/assets/83684042/dac837da-85b1-431e-87a3-8e39bd341def)
